content.rendered:
Our volunteers are essential to us, from providing administration support to professional photography, translation and entertainment. By offering time or expertise every single one of our volunteers is helping us reach our goal of deinstitutionalisation.

We’ve included some of the many ways you can volunteer with us, but if you have something different to offer please get in touch.

Volunteer your skills

Do you have professional skills that you would be willing to offer Hope and Homes for Children on a pro-bono basis? If so, we’d love to hear from you. Just email Maria at events@hopeandhomes.org

Event photography / videography

Are you a professional photographer who would be willing to cover one of our fabulous events? Help us capture the moment, promote our cause and share our mission.

Entertainment

Could you be the star attraction at one of our fundraisers? We’d love to hear from you if you’re a professional entertainer; MC, band, DJ, singer, musician, magician, caricaturist with that star quality!

Event support volunteers

Each of our events requires a skilled team including first aiders, security and marshals. Do you have the qualifications and experience to help us with fundraising event delivery?

Volunteer things, places, or experiences

Memorable experiences, exceptional venues, stellar prizes, awesome entertainment; can you help us deliver first class fundraisers? If so, we’d love to hear from you! Just email Maria at events@hopeandhomes.org

Venues for small and large events, indoor and outdoor

Do you own or manage a stellar venue that would be perfect for a fundraiser? Contact us if you would be willing to waiver your hire charges and help us host an event to remember!

Raffle prizes

Can you access or offer exceptional auction prizes? Private dining, an exotic hideaway or sunning staycation? Sports experience or pamper package? We’d love to hear about it.

Print suppliers

If you’re a custom print/merchandise supplier that would be willing to support one of our fundraising initiatives, please get in touch. We’ll be sure to give you a big shout out!

What our volunteers say

"I have been volunteering for Hope and Homes for Children for nearly 12 years and continue to be inspired by the work they have do. Volunteering gives me that warm and fuzzy feeling knowing I am helping to ensure that all children grow up within the love and security of a family."
